item.title: shell->code -- CSAW2018 Quals
item.description: Points: 100 Solves: 261 Description: Linked lists are great! They let you chain pieces of data together. nc pwn.chal.csaw.io 9005 flag format: flag{...} Given: shellpointcode Introduction shell->code was a 100 points pwn challenge on the CSAWâ€™18 CTF Qualification Round Reversing (The Problem) The clue was: “Linked lists are great! They let you chain pieces of data together” Running checksec on the binary gives the following result: This gives us a few clues already:
